verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Nearer, my God, to Thee; newline Nearer, my God, to Thee, newline Nearer to Thee!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Nearer, my God, to Thee, newline Nearer to Thee, newline E'en though it be a cross newline That raiseth me! newline Still all my song shall be,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though like the wanderer, newline The sun gone down, newline Darkness be over me, newline My rest a stone; newline Yet in my dreams I'd be,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There let the way appear, newline Steps unto heaven; newline All that Thou sendest me, newline In mercy given; newline Angels to beckon me,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then, with my waking thoughts newline Bright with Thy praise, newline Out of my stony griefs newline Bethel I'll raise, newline So by my woes to be,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Or if, on joyful wing newline Cleaving the sky, newline Sun, moon, and stars forgot, newline Upward I fly, newline Still all my song shall be,
